concept.title: 5303.104-7 Violations or Possible Violations

li.p:
(a) The contracting officer must provide a copy of the information and documentation generated under FAR 3.104-7 to their cognizant legal counsel and to SAF/GCR .
(1) The contracting officer must forward the information and determination required by FAR 3.104-7(a)(1) to the clearance approval authority (5301.9001(i)) of the affected procurement for review.
(f) See MP5301.601(a)(i) for individuals who may authorize award .
